text: The Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) is the money used in Indonesia. Rupiah started to be used in 1946. The coins that are used now are 25 rupiah, 50 rupiah, 100 rupiah, 200 rupiah, 500 rupiah and rupiah. The banknotes that are used are 1000 rupiah, rupiah, rupiah, rupiah, rupiah, rupiah and rupiah. Category:1940s establishments in Indonesia Category:1946 establishments in Asia Category:Currency of Asia
title: Indonesian rupiah
